function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased satisfaction with existing facilities","Impact":"Reduced well-being, decreased community participation","Mitigation":"Enhance facility safety measures, improve facility hygiene, increase accessibility","Technologies":"Enhanced cleaning technologies, contactless technology, virtual community platforms","People":"Community members, residents, facility users","Owner":"Community leaders, facility management"},{"Description":"Increased frequency of using community facilities","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission, overcrowding","Mitigation":"Limit facility capacity, implement social distancing measures, upgrade ventilation systems","Technologies":"Capacity monitoring technologies, social distancing tools, ventilation improvement systems","People":"Community members, residents, facility users","Owner":"Community leaders, facility management"},{"Description":"Dependence on non-contact interaction","Impact":"Reduced physical activity, social isolation","Mitigation":"Promote outdoor activities, encourage safe social interaction, provide virtual community platforms","Technologies":"Activity tracking devices, outdoor facility enhancement, virtual community platforms","People":"Community members, residents","Owner":"Community leaders"}]}
